experience.description: Site Reliability Engineer | Kept things up and running. Monitored errors and fixed them. Performed code reviews. Implemented infrastructure services.
Technical Team Lead | Provided directions, overall plans and leading executions toward goals for Alounak software.
Backend Developer | Maintained and developed Sheypoor backend.
Backend Developer | Maintained and developed Snapp backend.
Backend Developer | Developed game servers and network services.
Backend Developer | Maintained and developed the legacy business portal.
Backend Developer | Implemented backend services and game servers for online mobile games.

Software Developer | Researched on Distinct Element Methods (DEM) and Contact Detection algorithms. Implemented GeoDEMS software, a hydro-mechanical distinct element code for analyzing rock mechanics problems.
Researcher and Software Developer | Researched on implementation of an IMS server for 4th generation of mobile services on Linux platform.
Software Developer | Implemented of network services and banking protocols.
Intern | Implemented ATM hardware drivers based on XFS standard.
